common_questions.question: How is CORA different from other expense trackers?
common_questions.answer: CORA is the first financial wellness companion designed specifically for stressed entrepreneurs. Unlike traditional tools, CORA focuses on reducing anxiety while saving you 20+ hours per month through voice-first design and persistent AI memory.

common_questions.question: Is my financial data secure?
common_questions.answer: Absolutely. We use bank-level 256-bit encryption, are SOC 2 compliant, and never sell or share your data. Your connection to banks is handled by Plaid, trusted by millions.

common_questions.question: Can I try CORA before paying?
common_questions.answer: Yes! Every plan includes a 30-day free trial with full Pro features. No credit card required to start.

common_questions.question: What if I need help setting up?
common_questions.answer: CORA guides you through setup in under 10 minutes. Plus, our support team is available to help via chat or email.

common_questions.question: Can I export my data?
common_questions.answer: Yes, you can export all your data anytime in CSV, PDF, or QuickBooks format. Your data always belongs to you.
